title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.18 - Conduct of seconds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.18 - Conduct of seconds

State Regulations

During the progress of any round, seconds shall remain seated
and shall not engage in disruptive behavior. No second shall enter the ring
between rounds and assist a boxer back to his or her corner unless the bout has
been terminated by the referee or ringside physician. Notes

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
